quest.name: One Fish, Two Fish, Bread Fish, Stew Fish
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol is anxious to share news of a recent discovery.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested supplies to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine splendid bone fragments at the HuskDeliver the splendid bone fragments to Qhoterl PasolGather splendid earthworms at the HuskDeliver the splendid earthworms to Qhoterl PasolCatch a splendid larva at Mjrl's RegretDeliver the splendid larva to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Our workers discovered a vast body of water while excavating an underground cave, and found it absolutely teeming with fish. This blessing will provide a steady supply of sustenance as we dig deeper. That is, of course, if we can catch the fish.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: A lure made from animal bones should prove irresistible, and the Husk has no shortage of desiccated remains. My workers and I would be grateful if you could bring some to us.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Worms would make ideal bait, but only the most plump and juicy will do. Those in the Husk are fat from feasting on the remains littering the area. My workers and I would be grateful if you would bring us some─for the fish, of course, not for us!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Fish can't well resist a plump, juicy bug at the end of a hook, but a simple fruit worm won't do if we wish to catch the most succulent fish. However, a fruit worm may suffice to catch what we need. Go to Mjrl's Regret with fruit worm on hook, and bring us back a splendid larva.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The fish are certain to go wild for a lure made of animal bone. Make your way to the Husk, and you'll practically trip over what we need.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: We need worms, and lots of them. Big, juicy ones─the type that practically carpet the Husk. I trust you aren't too squeamish to handle them.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The task is simple: use a bug to catch a bug. Head to Mjrl's Regret, pole in hand and fruit worm on hook, and you should have what we need in no time.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Now there's my able gatherer! Well, did you get the items? We're ever so eager to begin feasting.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: You've outdone yourself once again! Until now, we've been subsisting on preserved food. It fills our bellies, but I'm of the philosophy that a meal is meant to be savored. Perhaps finally we can forget the fact that we're toiling away under the earth, if even just for one meal.
